title: Implement USGS API client
description: DataDev: Implement fetch_earthquakes() in data.py using USGS Earthquake API. Fetch events with magnitude >= 4.0 from last 7 days.

title: Write unit tests for services
description: LeadDev: Create tests/test_services.py with pytest tests for business logic

title: Create Pydantic models (Earthquake, Treaty, ExposureAlert)
description: LeadDev: Define models.py with Earthquake, Treaty, and ExposureAlert Pydantic models as per tech-spec interface contracts

title: Create mock treaty data and loader
description: DataDev: Create data/treaties.json with 5 sample treaties and implement load_treaties() in data.py

title: Implement Streamlit UI with map visualization
description: UIDev: Create app.py with Streamlit UI, Folium map showing earthquakes and treaty zones, alert panel, and summary statistics

title: Implement business logic in services.py
description: LeadDev: Implement calculate_distance_km, find_exposed_treaties, summarize_exposure functions
